synopsis.text:
Anna Yamada, the epitome of beauty and popularity, and Kyotarou Ichikawa, a middle school student with a chilling fascination for murder and a self-proclaimed eighth-grade syndrome, find themselves entangled in an unexpected relationship. Initially, Kyotarou envisions Anna as the perfect target for his twisted fantasies, but as fate brings them together in the library, he begins to uncover a different side to her.

Despite her flawless image, Anna is an airhead who struggles to read social cues, and as they spend more time together, Kyotarou develops an inexplicable fondness for her. His desire to harm her gradually transforms into a burning need to protect her, leaving him conflicted with his own feelings.

As they navigate their way through this peculiar relationship, both Kyotarou and Anna reveal themselves to be far from the stereotypes they initially appeared to be. Will they manage to defy each other's expectations and their own inner demons, or will their dark secrets ultimately drive them apart? Join this unconventional duo in a gripping tale of love, obsession, and self-discovery.
